display_name: Sleep Problem: How Often: Very difficult to get up in the morning
description:
Survey2: From mailed survey 2 (mailing year: :survey_year_s2:)

The original form was coded as 0-4, but has been recoded to 1- 5 to match all other occurrences of these variables (Survey 1, Survey 3).

[Search for all questions from Sleep Problem questionare within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/wsc/variables?search=sleep_problem)
